alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 14 at 9:02AM MDT until May 16 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Rapid City SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Cheyenne River near Plainview affecting Ziebach and Haakon Counties. For the Cheyenne River...including Plainview, Wasta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cheyenne River near Plainview. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, minor flooding of agricultural land along the Cheyenne River occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:31 AM MDT Sunday the stage was 15.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 17.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Use caution when walking or driving near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 945 AM MDT.
